Tempe.Westwood High School (Mesa, Arizona):
Westwood High School is a high school in Mesa, Arizona, United States under the jurisdiction of Mesa Public Schools. In the 1983-84 school year, it was honored as a Blue Ribbon school.


== Demographics ==
The demographic breakdown of the 3000 students enrolled for the 2012-2013 school year was:
Male - 50.2%
Female - 49.8%
Native American/Alaskan - 8.8%
Asian/Pacific Islander - 2.9%
Black - 7.3%
Hispanic - 50.0%
White - 30.4%
Multiracial - 0.6%
